empty.title: Your AI Archive is Empty
empty.description: As you use AI features like summarization or entity extraction, your results will be automatically saved here for future reference.

details.select: Select an entry from the list to view its details.
details.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this AI-generated entry from your archive?
details.regenerateConfirm: This will make a new request to the AI using the original source data. The current entry will be overwritten. Do you want to continue?

insightGenerated: Daily insight generated and saved to AI Archive!
